# ChangeLog
## v0.1.20
* Added getNationalitiesBySite to get Nationalities different from countries. https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/SETTINGS-16114
## v0.1.19
* Added unit test cases for newly added countries BR and KR

## v0.1.18
* Fix: Area is missing in site meta type def.

## v0.1.15
* Scope maintenance, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3936
* Removed dead code
* Typescript definitions, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3960

## v0.1.13
* Fix: getStatesBySiteId return null for site id 0, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2795

## v0.1.12
* Fix locale value to be actual value

##
* Updated graceful-fs to 4.x for NPM 3.x

## v0.1.10
* Fixed null error for deleted countries

## v0.1.9
* Fixed undefined error

## v0.1.8
* Removed unused dependencies

## v0.1.7
* Added site-meta-resource-ebay module as metadata provider
* Refactor and changed tests to reflect new state

## v0.1.4
* Fixed : `shelljs` dependency

## v0.1.3
* Added a safer way to create resource folders using shelljs that allows to create multi folder path at once.

## v0.1.2
* Added support to retrieve localized list of States
* Added support to retrieve localized list of Countries

* [More Details](https://github.corp.ebay.com/nodejs/site-meta-ebay#read-localized-lists-for-a-site)

## v0.1.3
* Extended API to support getSiteBySiteId

* [More Details](https://github.corp.ebay.com/ramahadevan/site-meta-ebay#reading-a-ebay-site-meta-by-id)

## v0.1.4
* Bug Fix: LocalizedList was trying to get countries and states for Sites that dont have localized list.
